entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
